parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster on the data plane.

parameters.name: HPAEnabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable Horizontal Pod Autoscaling (HPA).

parameters.name: HPAMaxReplicas
parameters.description: The maximum number of waypoint proxy pods when HPA is enabled.

parameters.name: HPAMinReplicas
parameters.description: The minimum number of waypoint proxy pods when HPA is enabled.

parameters.name: HPATargetCPU
parameters.description: The expected CPU utilization when HPA is enabled.

parameters.name: HPATargetMemory
parameters.description: The expected memory usage when HPA is enabled.

parameters.name: LimitCPU
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPU cores that are available to the waypoint proxy pods.

parameters.name: LimitMemory
parameters.description: The maximum size of the memory that is available to the waypoint proxy pods.

parameters.name: PreferECI
parameters.description: Specifies whether to deploy waypoint proxy pods based on Elastic Container Instance (ECI).

parameters.name: Replicas
parameters.description: The number of waypoint proxy pods.

parameters.name: RequestCPU
parameters.description: The number of CPU cores requested by the waypoint proxy pods.

parameters.name: RequestMemory
parameters.description: The size of the memory requested by the waypoint proxy pods.
